text: Hurricane Alex was a rare June hurricane and the first tropical cyclone of the 2010 Atlantic hurricane season. The storm first struck near Belize as a tropical storm. After entering the Gulf of Mexico, Alex became a hurricane and struck northeast Mexico; it was the first hurricane in June since Hurricane Allison in 1995. The storm killed 51 people (33 directly) and caused almost $1.9 billion in damage (2010 USD). Category:Category 2 Atlantic hurricanes Category:Hurricanes in Mexico Category:2010 Atlantic hurricane season Category:2010 in Belize Category:2010 in Mexico
title: Hurricane Alex (2010)
